auth.subtitle: Koyo na AI don Najeriya
auth.demoMode: Yanayin gwaji: Danna kowane maballin don bincika
auth.emailVerification: Da fatan za a tabbatar da adireshin imel

student.title: Yi Nasara A Kowane Darasi
student.subtitle: Daga makarantar sakandare zuwa karatun digiri
student.description: Samu taimako nan take da aikin gida, shirye-shiryen jarrabawa, da bincike a duk matakan ilimi. Ko kana shirye-shirye wa WAEC, karantawa domin digiri, ko kuma aiki akan masters thesis - mun rufe ka 24/7.

teacher.title: Sami Kudi Yayin Koyarwa
teacher.subtitle: Taimaka wa dalibai a kowane matakin ilimi
teacher.description: Taimaka wa dalibai daga makarantar sakandare har zuwa jami'a da kuma fiye da haka. Kirkiro abun ciki, tabbatar da amsoshi, kuma sami har zuwa â‚¦50,000 kowane wata yayin da kake sanya ilimi mai kyau ya zama mai saukin samun kowa.

parent.title: Goyi Bayan Tafiyar Yaron Ka
parent.subtitle: Kowane mataki daga makarantar sakandare zuwa kammala karatun
parent.description: Bi diddigin ci gaban ilimin yaronka kuma tabbatar da sun yi nasara a kowane muhimmin lokaci. Samu cikakkun rahotanni da basirar ko suna makarantar sakandare, jami'a, ko kuma suna bin digiri na gaba.

admin.title: Canza Cibiyar Ilimin Ka
admin.subtitle: Sakamako mafi kyau a duk matakan ilimi
admin.description: Shiga cikin cibiyoyin ilimi 200+ da suka riga suka ga ci gaba na 40% a cikin aikin ilimi yayin da suke rage farashin koyarwa. Cikakken tallafi daga ilimin sakandare zuwa shirye-shiryen postgraduate.
